channel.title: [RELEASE][317] DaD Scape V1 [317][RELEASE]
channel.description:
[img]http://i788.photobucket.com/albums/yy167/alpha_0nix/Capture.jpg[/img]
this is the release of my newest developement, DaD Scape V1.This isHomiescape based source. Having it be an All-Star source makes it perfect for beginners as it is very easy to code. Having an All-Star source also gives you the opportunities to find many tutorials that are compatible with your server. DaD Scape is a branch off from my earlier source release, Alpha-Scape. DaD Scape is much better compared to Alpha-Scape. DaD Scape has nearly all the bugs and glitches fixed that used to occur with All-Star Scape sources. This whole server is coded with JAVA, which is easy for beginners to learn. I really do hope that you enjoy this server. Please read, download, reply, and rep++ if you think it is cool!
Here is the release of DaD Scape V1:
[u][b]Pictures[/u]
HOME [img]http://i788.photobucket.com/albums/yy167/alpha_0nix/home.png[/img]
FIRST LOG-IN [img]http://i788.photobucket.com/albums/yy167/alpha_0nix/firstlogin.png[/img]
TRAIN [img]http://i788.photobucket.com/albums/yy167/alpha_0nix/train.png[/img]
SKILLS [img]http://i788.photobucket.com/albums/yy167/alpha_0nix/skills.png[/img]
FUN PK [img]http://i788.photobucket.com/albums/yy167/alpha_0nix/funpk.png[/img]
PK BOX LOBBY [img]http://i788.photobucket.com/albums/yy167/alpha_0nix/pklobby.png[/img]
PK BOX [img]http://i788.photobucket.com/albums/yy167/alpha_0nix/pkbox.png[/img]
SHOPS [img]http://i788.photobucket.com/albums/yy167/alpha_0nix/shops.png[/img]
SLAYER [img]http://i788.photobucket.com/albums/yy167/alpha_0nix/slayer.png[/img]
BARROWS LOBBY [img]http://i788.photobucket.com/albums/yy167/alpha_0nix/barrowslobby.png[/img]
BARROWS [img]http://i788.photobucket.com/albums/yy167/alpha_0nix/barrows.png[/img]
STAFF ZONE [img]http://i788.photobucket.com/albums/yy167/alpha_0nix/staffzone.png[/img]
QUEST TAB [img]http://i788.photobucket.com/albums/yy167/alpha_0nix/stafflist.png[/img]
LOG OUT TAB [img]http://i788.photobucket.com/albums/yy167/alpha_0nix/logout.png[/img]
[b][u]Cool Server Updates[/b]
Barrows NPCs attack you if you get too close!
Yell ranks have been added (this says what staff rank you are)
When you log-in it says the number of people online.
You must go through the portal to enter barrows.
A godsword mini game is also included on this source (you can earn godswords)
Your quest tab doubles as a staff list
NOW YOU CAN DOWNLOAD THE SOURCE!!! (note: this server uses the downloadable silab client. I will include the download link for the people that do not have this basic client.)
[img]http://i788.photobucket.com/albums/yy167/alpha_0nix/downloadnow.png[/img]
CLICK THE LINK BELOW TO DOWNLOAD THE SOURCE!!! [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?xmtyqnonxye]http://www.mediafire.com/?xmtyqnonxye[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?xmtyqnonxye]http://www.mediafire.com/?xmtyqnonxye[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?xmtyqnonxye]http://www.mediafire.com/?xmtyqnonxye[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?xmtyqnonxye]http://www.mediafire.com/?xmtyqnonxye[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?xmtyqnonxye]http://www.mediafire.com/?xmtyqnonxye[/url]
CLICK THE LINK BELOW TO DOWNLOAD THE CLIENT (downloadable silab client) [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?j3jnmjdgzwx]http://www.mediafire.com/?j3jnmjdgzwx[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?j3jnmjdgzwx]http://www.mediafire.com/?j3jnmjdgzwx[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?j3jnmjdgzwx]http://www.mediafire.com/?j3jnmjdgzwx[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?j3jnmjdgzwx]http://www.mediafire.com/?j3jnmjdgzwx[/url] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?j3jnmjdgzwx]http://www.mediafire.com/?j3jnmjdgzwx[/url]
Please reply and tell me what you think! Good or bad, I would very much appreciate your feedback to make me a better coder. Thanks guys! -Alpha 0nx

item.title: [RELEASE][317] DaD Scape V1 [317][RELEASE]
item.dc:creator: @aurocaido aurocaido
item.description:
@aurocaido wrote:

i am sincerely sorry… but i hate this kind of server. Its like an allstar stabbingscape mixed, sorry but i am not a fan at all. But maybe some others are! So good release, it might help somebody

Read full topic
